SMBus Slave Address Register

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0xc
Size:
0x4

Description

Target slave address for master transactions

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:7] reserved r 0x0 Reserved
[6:0] slave_addr rw 0x0 Slave Address

Field Descriptions

reserved - Reserved

Reserved bits

slave_addr - Slave Address

7-bit slave address (bits[7:1]), bit[0] is R/W (set by controller)
